attributes.action: Lower The Legal Driving Age to 16
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The driving age should be lowered to 16 to prevent as much car theft and 'joyriding' and give an extra year of practice or lower the age of taking lessons to 16 and have a test at the age of 17

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
